pages.about: About Royal Oasis Resort: Our Story & Values 18+ Royal Oasis Resort Casino About Us Dining Contact Us Welcome to Royal Oasis Resort Nestled in the heart of Monte Carlo, Royal Oasis Resort offers an unparalleled blend of luxury, comfort, and elegance. Our resort is a sanctuary for those seeking a lavish escape, featuring exquisite accommodations, gourmet dining, and world-class amenities. Whether you are here for a relaxing retreat or an exciting getaway, Royal Oasis Resort promises an unforgettable experience. Our Mission At Royal Oasis Resort, our mission is to provide an exceptional and unforgettable experience for every guest. We strive to deliver unparalleled luxury, comfort, and personalized service, ensuring that each stay is nothing short of extraordinary. Our commitment to excellence and attention to detail set us apart as a premier destination for both relaxation and adventure. Our Values Excellence We uphold the highest standards in all aspects of our operations, continuously seeking to exceed guest expectations. Integrity We conduct our business with honesty and transparency, building trust with our guests and partners. Innovation We embrace creativity and innovation, constantly evolving to provide unique and memorable experiences. Sustainability We are committed to sustainable practices, ensuring that our operations are environmentally responsible and beneficial to the community. Guest-Centric Approach Our guests are at the heart of everything we do. We listen to their needs and tailor our services to create personalized and exceptional experiences. Contact Us Meet Our Team At Royal Oasis Resort, our dedicated team of professionals is committed to ensuring every guest enjoys a luxurious and memorable stay. Get to know the key individuals who lead our exceptional team. John Smith General Manager John brings over 20 years of experience in the hospitality industry, ensuring the highest standards of service and guest satisfaction at Royal Oasis Resort. Jane Doe Director of Operations Jane oversees daily operations, focusing on efficiency and excellence to provide a seamless experience for our guests. Michael Brown Head Chef Michael leads our culinary team, crafting exquisite dishes that blend local flavors with international cuisine to delight our guests. Emily White Spa Director Emily ensures that our spa services provide the ultimate in relaxation and rejuvenation, offering a range of treatments tailored to our guests' needs. Customer Reviews Jessica Brown June 10, 2024 "Our stay at Royal Oasis Resort was absolutely amazing! The rooms were luxurious, the staff was attentive, and the amenities were top-notch. Highly recommend!" Michael Johnson May 28, 2024 "The dining experience at Royal Oasis Resort exceeded all expectations. Each meal was a culinary delight, perfectly complemented by the elegant ambiance." Emily Davis May 15, 2024 "The spa treatments at Royal Oasis Resort were so relaxing and rejuvenating. It was exactly what I needed to unwind and recharge." pages.dining: Dining at Royal Oasis Resort: Culinary Delights 18+ Royal Oasis Resort Casino About Us Dining Contact Us Exquisite Dining at Royal Oasis Resort Indulge in a culinary journey at Royal Oasis Resort, where our diverse dining options cater to every palate. From gourmet restaurants to stylish bars, experience the finest in food and drink, crafted by our world-class chefs and mixologists. Whether you are seeking an intimate dinner, a casual meal, or a vibrant nightlife experience, our dining venues offer something for everyone. Our Restaurants and Bars Royal Oasis Resort offers a variety of dining experiences, each designed to delight your senses and provide an unforgettable culinary journey. Gourmet Restaurant Savor exquisite dishes crafted by our expert chefs, using the finest ingredients to create a memorable dining experience. Enjoy a sophisticated atmosphere perfect for romantic dinners or special occasions. Seafood Grill Relish the freshest seafood, grilled to perfection and served with stunning ocean views. Our Seafood Grill offers a relaxed yet elegant setting, ideal for enjoying the bounty of the sea. International Buffet Explore a world of flavors at our International Buffet, featuring a diverse selection of dishes from around the globe. Perfect for families and groups, our buffet offers something for every taste. Lobby Bar Unwind with a cocktail or a glass of wine at our stylish Lobby Bar. With its comfortable seating and relaxed ambiance, it's the perfect spot for a pre-dinner drink or a nightcap. Poolside Bar Enjoy refreshing drinks and light bites by the pool at our Poolside Bar. Whether you're lounging in the sun or taking a dip, our bar offers a convenient and delightful way to stay refreshed. Menu and Culinary Highlights At Royal Oasis Resort, our culinary team is dedicated to creating extraordinary dining experiences. Explore our diverse menus and discover the unique flavors that set our restaurants and bars apart. Fine Dining Indulge in gourmet cuisine with a focus on seasonal ingredients and exquisite presentation. Our fine dining menu features a range of dishes designed to tantalize your taste buds. Seafood Specials Experience the freshest seafood prepared with a creative twist. From grilled fish to succulent shellfish, our seafood specials are a must-try for any seafood lover. International Cuisine Travel the world without leaving your seat. Our international cuisine offers a variety of dishes from around the globe, each expertly crafted to deliver an authentic taste experience. Signature Cocktails Sip on our unique signature cocktails, crafted by our talented mixologists. Each drink is a perfect blend of flavors, designed to delight your palate and enhance your dining experience. Whether you're in the mood for a lavish meal or a casual snack, our menus are designed to cater to all tastes and preferences. Join us at Royal Oasis Resort for an unforgettable culinary journey. Reserve Your Table Today Special Offers and Promotions Discover exclusive deals and exciting promotions at Royal Oasis Resort. Our special offers are designed to enhance your stay and provide exceptional value. Weekend Getaway Package Enjoy a luxurious weekend at Royal Oasis Resort with our exclusive getaway package. Includes deluxe accommodations, complimentary breakfast, and access to all resort amenities. Spa and Wellness Retreat Indulge in a rejuvenating spa experience with our wellness retreat package. pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy of Royal Oasis Resort 18+ Royal Oasis Resort Casino About Us Dining Contact Us Privacy Policy 1. Introduction Welcome to Royal Oasis Resort. We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines our practices regarding the collection, use, and sharing of your information when you visit our website or use our services. 2. Information We Collect We collect various types of information to provide and improve our services. This includes personal information you provide directly, such as your name, email address, phone number, and payment information, as well as information collected automatically through cookies and other tracking technologies. 3. How We Use Your Information We use your information to operate, maintain, and provide you with our services. This includes processing your bookings, personalizing your experience, sending you promotional materials, and improving the overall functionality of our website and services. 4. Sharing Your Information We may share your information with third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or serving our users. These third parties are obligated to maintain the confidentiality of your information and are restricted from using it for any purpose other than what we specify. 5. Data Security We implement a variety of security measures to ensure the safety of your personal information. These measures include encryption, firewalls, and secure socket layer technology. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure, so we cannot guarantee absolute security. 6. Cookies and Tracking Technologies We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track the activity on our website and hold certain information. Cookies are files with a small amount of data which may include an anonymous unique identifier. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent. 7. Third-Party Services Our website may contain links to third-party websites or services that are not owned or controlled by Royal Oasis Resort. We have no control over, and assume no responsibility for, the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party websites or services. 8. Children's Privacy Our services are not intended for individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from anyone under the age of 18. If we become aware that we have collected personal information from a child under the age of 18 without verification of parental consent, we take steps to remove that information from our servers. 9. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page. 10. Your Rights Depending on your location, you may have the right to access, correct, update, or delete the personal information we have collected about you. To exercise these rights, please contact us at royaloasisresort@gmail.com. 11. Data Retention We will retain your personal information only for as long as is necessary for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy. We will retain and use your information to the extent necessary to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our policies. 12. International Data Transfers Your information, including personal data, may be transferred to – and maintained on – computers located outside of your state, province, country, or other governmental jurisdiction where the data protection laws may differ from those of your jurisdiction. 13. Consent to Processing By providing your information to us, you consent to the processing of your personal data in accordance with this Privacy Policy and you acknowledge that your information may be processed outside your jurisdiction, including in the United States. 14. Marketing Communications You may opt-out of receiving marketing communications from us by following the unsubscribe link or instructions provided in any email we send or by contacting us directly. We will remove you from our marketing lists within a reasonable period. 15. Your Consent By using our website and services, you consent to our Privacy Policy and agree to its terms. If you do not agree to this policy, please do not use our website or services. 16. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at royaloasisresort@gmail.com. 17. Governing Law This Privacy Policy is governed by the laws of the country in which Royal Oasis Resort is located. Any disputes arising from or in connection with this Privacy Policy will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of that country. 18. Privacy Shield Framework Royal Oasis Resort complies with the EU-U.S. and Swiss-U.S. Privacy Shield Frameworks as set forth by the U.S. Department of Commerce regarding the collection, use, and retention of personal information transferred from the European Union and Switzerland to the United States. 19. Third-Party Analytics We use third-party analytics tools to help us understand how our website and services are used. These tools may collect information sent by your device or our service, including the web pages you visit, add-ons, and other information that assists us in improving our service. 20. Changes to Your Information If your personal information changes, or if you no longer desire our service, you may correct, update, delete inaccuracies, or request deactivation of your account by making the change on our member information page or by contacting us at royaloasisresort@gmail.com. Disclaimer Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions Casino About Us Dining Contact Us This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website. Got it!
